notesStmt.note: First and last few leaves very dark and stained, with worming and loss of text. Incomplete at the end.

Shelomoh ben Avraham: inscribed, folio 1v. Eli῾ezer ben Shelomoh, Ya῾aḳov ben Avraham, Elḥanan: inscribed, folio 2v.An incomplete table of context: folio 2v.Censored by Dominico Irosolomitano (active 1575-1624): inscribed with his name (folio 159v); see 61, and appendix § 62-74.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
